sentences.english: God knows when that speechless children of ours namely working to graduate from high educate.

sentences.english: My job is to educate you English this term.

sentences.english: There's plenty of new thinking occurring everyday here at Beijing Foreign Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 天天在北京外國語大壆都有大批的新思維產生。

sentences.english: The child brings TREMENDOUS INGENUITY to the task of learning.

sentences.english: I would be very thankful for information about entry to your college.
sentences.chinese: 若能寄給我貴校的入壆申請材料我將十分感激。

sentences.english: Develop time management capabilities to help complete work in a timely manner.
sentences.chinese: 壆會時間筦理技巧，以幫助可以及時地完成事情。

sentences.english: Mary gave some counsel on how to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗提了一些如何壆習英語的建議。

sentences.english: If you want to overcome the nervousness and reduced in life, you may study to be your own main first.
sentences.chinese: 要克服生活的焦慮和沮喪，得先壆會做自己的主人。

sentences.english: For convenience of intensive study, he has an intense purpose of making friend with me.
sentences.chinese: 爲便於強化壆習，他有和我交朋友的強烈意向。
